message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, the product's value is higher than $120. I can meet you halfway and offer it to you for $150.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $150. Would you be willing to go down to $135?
I can see you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I can offer it to you for $145.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $145. Would you be willing to go down to $140?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $145, Bob. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a premium warranty and a free accessory package. The price remains at $145.
I appreciate the extras you're offering, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $145. Would you be willing to go down to $135, and we can discuss the details of the warranty and accessory package?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to reach an agreement, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $140, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. I'll throw in the premium warranty and accessory package, just like before.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $140, but I'm still not sure if that's the best deal for me. Would you be willing to go down to $137.50, and we can finalize the deal?
